mapper.select: SELECT tra_nm --상호명 ,admdong_nm --읍면동명 ,xcrd::numeric --map함수에 적용될때는 숫자여야하므로 numeric으로 casting ,ycrd::numeric FROM TRA_XYCRD_SEOUL WHERE tra_upjong_mid_cd = #{upjongMidCd} --'Q12(커피점/카페)' 'D03(종합소매점(편의점))' AND sgg_cd = #{sggCd} ORDER BY tra_num desc LIMIT 100
select substr(admdong_cd,1,5) as sigCd ,st_astext(st_multi(st_union(st_transform(st_setsrid(geom,5179),3857)))) as geom from alp_admdong_alp_m_sum WHERE substr(admdong_cd,1,5) = #{sigCd} group by 1

select T21.emdCd ,T21.emdKorNm ,T21.emdGeom as emdGeom ,T22.guGeom as guGeom --선택한 시군구의 센터값을 구하기위해 한단이 추가됨..드롭박스 채울때 들고오게 할 예정 ,T21.rank ,T21.traCnt from ( SELECT T101.admdong_cd AS emdCd ,substr(T101.admdong_nm, 11) AS emdKorNm ,st_astext(st_transform(st_setsrid(T101.geom,5179),3857)) AS emdGeom ,ntile(5) over(ORDER BY T102.cnt desc) AS rank ,cnt AS traCnt FROM alp_admdong_alp_m_sum T101 LEFT JOIN (SELECT admdong_cd, count(tra_num) cnt FROM tra_xycrd_seoul WHERE admdong_cd like concat(#{sigCd},'%') GROUP BY 1 ) T102 ON T101.admdong_cd = substr(T102.admdong_cd,1,8) WHERE T101.admdong_cd like concat(#{sigCd},'%')) T21 ,( select substr(admdong_cd,1,5)as sgg_cd ,st_astext(st_multi(st_union(st_transform(st_setsrid(geom,5179),3857)))) as guGeom from alp_admdong_alp_m_sum where substr(admdong_cd,1,5) like #{sigCd} group by 1 ) T22 where substr(T21.emdCd,1,5) = T22.sgg_cd
